resources.string:
Sorry - I couldn't find any apps with notification ads.

If you're seeing notification ads anyway, there's probably a new advertising company the detector doesn't know about yet.

If you'd like to help, you can use the button below to email a list of your installed apps to me (the detector developer).

This is completely optional, and you'll be able to see everything that's being sent before it goes out. Your email address and installed applications will not be shared with anyone else, and I won't send you spam.
